author: YaYa Teller
text: Should Chris Rock had been so ignorant and rude? Also no. Two wrong don’t make a right sometimes you have to physically express your boundaries so a muthafuck won’t try you and learn a lesson. I truly believe every deserves to be punched in the face at least once in their life…

author: YaYa Teller
text: You probably can imagine the amount of time Will Smith has seen his wife cry over it. And for people saying he laughed at the joke, he was still laughing at the pervious joke when Chris Rock told that shitty one. Should Will have hit him in this setting on national tv? No but…

author: YaYa Teller
text: That was a distasteful joke and people trying to explain shit away by saying well he’s a comedian is bullshit. Jada has opened up about the real hurt she’s experienced dealing with alopecia, some shit is off limits.

author: YaYa Teller
text: Fuck that “violence isn’t the answer”. Get off your high horse we’ve all been there. Sometimes shit happens and people really strike a nerve and there are consequences to actions on both ends. #WillAndChris #WillSmith
